title: Citizen: Cleaning of the Label Printer
text: If the print from your label printer is unclear, it often helps to clean the label printer. To ensure good print quality and to extend the lifetime of the printer, it is very important to clean the printer regularly (ideally at each roll change). The manufacturer recommends using the "Head Cleaner" supplied with the printer and a cotton swab. If you no longer have this, you can also use a dry cloth.
description:
If the print from your label printer is unclear, it often helps to clean the label printer.
 

To ensure good print quality and to extend the lifetime of the printer, it is very important to clean the printer regularly (ideally at each roll change).


The manufacturer recommends using the "Head Cleaner" supplied with the printer and a cotton swab. If you no longer have this, you can also use a dry cloth.

title: Citizen: Print is too faint / wrong adjustment
text: If the printer does not print correctly (for example, it keeps printing empty labels in between), please check the following 2 things: 1. Is the printer clean? You can read how to clean the printer in the article Cleaning of the label printer. 2. Are the blue wheels in the printer set correctly? Open the printer and set the small blue wheel (media thickness) to 0 and the bigger blue wheel (media width) to 9. If that does not help, please disconnect the printer from the power supply for 30 seconds and then reconnect it.
description:
If the printer does not print correctly (for example, it keeps printing empty labels in between), please check the following 2 things:

1. Is the printer clean? You can read how to clean the printer in the article Cleaning of the label printer.


2. Are the blue wheels in the printer set correctly? Open the printer and set the small blue wheel (media thickness) to 0 and the bigger blue wheel (media width) to 9.




If that does not help, please disconnect the printer from the power supply for 30 seconds and then reconnect it.

title: Label printer is not working at all
text: If the light on the label printer isn't turning on, and nothing happens when you press the FEED button, try these steps: 1. Disconnect the printer from the power for 30 seconds. 2. Check if the power cord is plugged into the wall outlet correctly. 3. Make sure the power cord is properly connected to the printer. 4. Test the wall outlet by plugging in another working appliance. 5. Is the power cord damaged? Try using a new power cord.
description:
If the light on the label printer isn't turning on, and nothing happens when you press the FEED button, try these steps:


1. Disconnect the printer from the power for 30 seconds.


2. Check if the power cord is plugged into the wall outlet correctly.


3. Make sure the power cord is properly connected to the printer.


4. Test the wall outlet by plugging in another working appliance.


5. Is the power cord damaged? Try using a new power cord.

title: Blank labels in between actual labels
